flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=3230>>3230 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 3230-1200=<<3230-1200=2030>>2030 dollars.
#### 2030

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3200, not 3230. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
